data.title: RIDDLEY WALKER. A novel by HOBAN, Russell: (1980)
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Published by Summit Books, New York - 1980 - Dust Jacket Included - First US Edition. 8vo.pp.xiv + 220. Quarter blue cloth hardcover in complete dustwrapper. Very good. - RIDDLEY WALKER. A novel
data.text:
Riddley Walker: a Novel

Hoban, Russell

Published by Summit Books, 1980

ISBN 10: 0671421476 / ISBN 13: 9780671421472

Used / Trade Paperback

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Callaghan Books South, New Port Richey, FL, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Trade Paperback. Condition: Very Good. Trade paperback, beautiful illustration of night rural scene on front wrapper, b/w photo of Hoban on back wrapper, 220 lightly browned pages, praise on front wrapper from The Observer, Anthony Burgess, Sunday Times, and The Guardian. Tiny surface wear spot at top front edge near tip, micronick at spine top left and right edge, spine bottom left edge. Near Fine. Seller Inventory # 26834

Contact seller

Riddley Walker: A Novel

Hoban, Russell

Published by Summit Books, New York, 1980

Used / Hardcover

Quantity: 1 available

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First American edition. Remainder mark on bottom of text block. Dust wrapper not price clipped. 5 3/4 x 8 1/2 inches. 220 pages. Seller Inventory # 018614

Contact seller

RIDDLEY WALKER: A NOVEL .

Hoban, Russell

Published by Summit Books, New York, 1981

ISBN 10: 0671421476 / ISBN 13: 9780671421472

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Currey, L.W. Inc. ABAA/ILAB, Elizabethtown, NY, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Octavo, boards. First U.S. edition. Winner of the 1981 John W. Campbell award for best novel. 1981 Nebula nominee. Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-531. Pringle, Science Fiction: The 100 Best Novels 93. Sargent, British and American Utopian Literature, 1516-1985, p. 400. A Burgess 99 novel. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#169687). Seller Inventory # 169687

Contact seller
